Content:: Germano Longo (24 May 1933 – 14 July 2022)[1] was an Italian actor and voice actor. He was sometimes credited as Herman Lang or Grant Laramy.[2] Born in Poggiardo, Longo attended the Centro Sperimentale di Cinematografia in Rome, graduating in 1953.[2] He was very active in genre films, particularly peplum, adventure and Spaghetti Western films.[2] He was also active as a dubber and as a dubbing director.[2]
Title: Germano Longo - Wikipedia
